医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
CEPI 和 HMRI 合作加速大流行疫苗的开发CEPI、流行病防范创新联盟和休斯敦卫理公会研究所 (HMRI) 今天宣布建立合作伙伴关系，将尖端人工智能 (AI) 技术与现有的实验室技术相结合，以加快针对新型病毒威胁的未来疫苗的开发（也称为疾病 X）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/CEPI-and-HMRI-partner-to-accelerate-development-of-pandemic-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/CEPI-and-HMRI-partner-to-accelerate-development-of-pandemic-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5bae52d-240f-4563-b222-aa6dd2f77c5c Tue, 18 Jul 2023 13:38:58 -0400 CEPI and HMRI partner to accelerate development of pandemic vaccines
水稻生物工程师获得美国国立卫生研究院资助镰状细胞病研究莱斯大学生物工程师 Gang Bao 和他的团队获得了美国国立卫生研究院为期 4 年、价值 260 万美元的资助，用于解决围绕使用基因编辑治疗镰状细胞病的安全性和有效性的关键问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Rice-bioengineers-receive-NIH-grant-for-sickle-cell-disease-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Rice-bioengineers-receive-NIH-grant-for-sickle-cell-disease-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a10e0a5b-16fe-4813-a74d-a521cf01bb0d Tue, 18 Jul 2023 13:32:56 -0400 Rice bioengineers receive NIH grant for sickle cell disease research
有针对性的大脑刺激有望治疗 TBI 相关的记忆丧失创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 导致 1% 到 2% 的人口残疾，其中最常见的残疾之一是短期记忆问题。电刺激已成为改善其他神经系统疾病患者大脑功能的可行工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Targeted-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-for-treating-TBI-lated-memory-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Targeted-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-for-treating-TBI-lated-memory-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=970cd410-fb55-4357-ad3c-4eab94c4fa94 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 13:26:11 -0400 Targeted brain stimulation shows promise for treating TBI-related memory loss
范德比尔特大学获得 700 万美元资助，用于研究危重患者的镇静剂范德比尔特大学医学中心获得 PCORI（以患者为中心的结果研究所）颁发的 700 万美元、为期五年的资助，用于比较两种用于在急诊室 (ED) 或重症监护室 (ICU) 放置呼吸管的镇静剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Vanderbilt-receives-247-million-grant-to-study-sedatives-for-riticly-ill-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Vanderbilt-receives-247-million-grant-to-study-sedatives-for-riticly-ill-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e240292f-d386-469d-9b80-da6499a7c39f Tue, 18 Jul 2023 13:16:48 -0400 Vanderbilt receives $7 million grant to study sedatives for critically ill patients
文化和个人因素影响睡眠数量和质量睡眠对健康、福祉和生产力有着巨大影响，但目前人们的睡眠时间和睡眠质量尚未得到准确报道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Cultural-and-individual-factors-influence-sleep-quantity-and-quality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Cultural-and-individual-factors-influence-sleep-quantity-and-quality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63f96d13-369c-44bc-85bb-bc1f34ad877d Tue, 18 Jul 2023 13:12:12 -0400 Cultural and individual factors influence sleep quantity and quality
脊髓液测试可用于早期发现路易体病路易体病是继阿尔茨海默病之后第二常见的神经退行性疾病。隆德大学的一个研究小组现在表明，可以通过脊髓液测试在症状出现之前检测出这种疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Spinal-fluid-test-could-be-used-for-early-detection-of-Lewy-body-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Spinal-fluid-test-could-be-used-for-early-detection-of-Lewy-body-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4db0961-c646-4e82-8de5-30915ffc0193 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 12:53:07 -0400 Spinal fluid test could be used for early detection of Lewy body disease
移动应用程序使用人工智能来检测眼部疾病加泰罗尼亚大学 (UOC) 的两名生物信息学和生物统计学硕士学位学生开发了一款移动应用程序，能够在几秒钟内检测某人是否患有青光眼、糖尿病性视网膜病变或白内障（世界上最常见的三种疾病）视力丧失和失明的原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Mobile-app-uses-AI-to-detect-eye-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Mobile-app-uses-AI-to-detect-eye-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a249b1e-b8b9-4325-b5db-07affc526474 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 12:47:52 -0400 Mobile app uses AI to detect eye diseases
研究发现血液蛋白质与严重烧伤的死亡率有关由大阪大学领导的研究人员使用质谱法鉴定了十种与严重烧伤死亡率相关的血液蛋白。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Study-identizes-blood- Proteins-linked-to-mortality-in-severe-burns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Study-identizes-blood- Proteins-linked-to-mortality-in-severe-burns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0719d7ce-4cd4-4131-a44b-933c4e088425 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 12:41:45 -0400 Study identifies blood proteins linked to mortality in severe burns
PFAS 的免疫调节作用会损害健康由于全氟烷基物质和多氟烷基物质 (PFAS) 具有持久性，因此也被称为“永恒化学品”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Immunomodulatory-effects-of-PFAS-can-impair-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Immunomodulatory-effects-of-PFAS-can-impair-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7963269-cced-406a-95be-518dc67dfba7 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 12:26:22 -0400 Immunomodulatory effects of PFAS can impair health
PCORI 拨款 2.08 亿美元资助 17 项新的临床有效性比较研究以患者为中心的结果研究所 (PCORI) 今天宣布拨款总额为 2.08 亿美元，用于支持 17 项新的比较临床有效性研究 (CER) 研究，其中包括四项规模和范围特别大、涉及复杂问题的试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/PCORI-awards-24208-million-to-fund-17-new-comparative-clinical-effectness-research-studies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/PCORI-awards-24208-million-to-fund-17-new-comparative-clinical-effectness-research-studies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7d897ff-973b-40d5-9143-dc3a7340325b Tue, 18 Jul 2023 12:17:20 -0400 PCORI awards $208 million to fund 17 new comparative clinical effectiveness research studies
